title: Privacy Policy
description: Privacy policy for Vidtory AI Creative Generator

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using Vidtory AI Creative Generator.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.1: Name and email address when you register an account
items.3: Payment information (processed by secure third parties)
items.4: Contact information when you contact us

items.1: Content generation history and credit usage

paymentData.title: Payment Data
paymentData.content: Payment information is processed by secure third-party payment providers. We do not store credit card information or full payment details on our servers.

items.2: Process transactions and manage your credits
items.4: Provide customer support and resolve issues
items.5: Analyze service usage to improve experience

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with trusted third parties only when necessary to provide services, process payments, or comply with the law.

payment.title: 5. Payment Processing
payment.content: All payment transactions are processed by encrypted third-party payment providers that comply with the highest security standards. We only store information necessary to manage your transactions and credits.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

items.1: Right to access your personal information
items.3: Right to request deletion of your account and data
items.4: Right to opt-out of marketing emails
items.5: Right to complain about how we handle your data

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze service usage. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: 10. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on the service or sending you an email.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us via email or Facebook Messenger.
